title: Melania Trump's New Movie About Becoming First Lady
summary: Melania Trump, the wife of former US President Donald Trump, has made a new documentary film. The film is called 'Melania: Twenty Days to History' and shows her life in the 20 days before her husband's second inauguration as president. This is special because it is the first time a sitting first lady has been in such a movie. Melania produced the film herself. At the movie's premiere, she walked on a black carpet with her husband and said she wanted to show people what it is like to become first lady again. The film was sold to Amazon for a lot of money, about $40 million, and they spent more on advertising it. The article also talks about other news, like actors nominated for awards and weather events, but the main story is about Melania's film.

background_read: Melania Trump is the wife of Donald Trump, who was the 45th president of the United States. A first lady is the president's wife and often does special projects. A documentary is a type of movie that tells true stories about real people or events. Amazon is a big company that sells many things and also makes and shows movies online. A premiere is a big event where a movie is shown for the first time, often with famous people walking on a special carpet.
